title: Question on PBE (signing up)
body: so I remember signing up months ago and I really want to be a tester? is there any way i could increase my chances of getting approved by the rito gods in letting me report bugs, and play in the PBE? thank you so much for those that reply and help me out! {{champion:105}}

replies.body:
The best thing you can do to increase your chances of getting chosen is to *actively play* League and to be a *positive force* in the community. We typically send out PBE invites in waves, so the selection criteria can change a lot, depending on what we're testing at the time of invite. Check our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) out for more information on how the system works.

Let me know if you have any questions.
